channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 19:47 Dumping anxiety in the Donetsk region.Creat on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 19:47 Dumping anxiety in the Donetsk region.Creat on further messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
